front.title: Kessel Operative
front.gametext: While at a Kessel site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your smuggler is on Kessel) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Kessel from Reserve Deckreshuffle.
front.lore: Mercenaries that make a profit selling materials to the troops stationed on Kessel. Help the Empire prevent escape attempts by the prisoners there.
